opennlp.ccg.parse.tagger.sequencescoring
Class SequenceScorer

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.ngrams.NgramScorer
      opennlp.ccg.ngrams.StandardNgramModel
          opennlp.ccg.parse.tagger.sequencescoring.SequenceScorer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reversible, FeatureExtractor, SignScorer
public class SequenceScorer
extends StandardNgramModel

Initialise with a language model over the output sequences and, given a List of List>'s initially tagged with "observation" probabilities (output probabilities only based on local features), return the forward-pass re-estimated probabilites of the output classes.

Author:
Dennis N. Mehay

logProbFromNgram

protected float logProbFromNgram(int i,
                                 int order)
Returns the log prob of the ngram starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order, with backoff. (Assumes words in wordsToScore have already been converted to strings in stringsToScore, via call to prepareToScoreWords.)

Specified by:
logProbFromNgram in class NgramScorer
